item.title: Version 1.9.24
item.description:
NameQuick v1.9.24 Release Notes

🎯 Major Improvement: Enhanced AI Prompt System

I’ve completely reworked how NameQuick communicates with AI models to ensure more reliable and consistent pattern extractions and transformations.

✨ What’s New

Improved Prompt Engineering

  • More Reliable Extractions: The AI now better understands your pattern requirements and extracts data more consistently
  • Better Transformation Handling: Text transformations (uppercase, lowercase, etc.) are now applied more reliably
  • Enhanced Pattern Compliance: The system now adheres more strictly to your defined patterns, reducing unexpected results

Why This Matters

Previously, the AI could sometimes misinterpret pattern instructions or apply transformations inconsistently. This update significantly improves the reliability of pattern-based renaming, making NameQuick more predictable and trustworthy for your workflows.

⚠️ Important Note for Existing Users

Your existing templates may need minor adjustments. While we’ve worked hard to maintain compatibility, the improved prompt system may handle some edge cases differently. We recommend:

  1. Test your existing templates with a few sample files before bulk processing
  2. Check that extractions are working as expected
  3. Verify transformations are being applied correctly
  4. Adjust patterns if needed - most templates will work without changes, but some complex patterns may benefit from small tweaks

🚀 Long-term Benefits

This foundational improvement sets us up for: - More consistent results across different AI providers - Better support for complex pattern requirements - Reduced need for manual corrections - A more stable platform for future enhancements

💡 Tips for Best Results

  • If a template isn’t working as expected, try simplifying complex patterns

This update represents a significant step forward in making NameQuick’s AI-powered renaming more reliable and predictable. While it may require some adjustment to existing workflows, the long-term benefits of improved consistency and reliability make this a worthwhile upgrade.

Questions or issues? Please reach out at support@namequick.cc
